about_the_game:
Prince John has formed otherworldly and impossible alliances, and has usurped the throne of England. Upon returning from the Third Crusade, you’re declared an outlaw, and must liberate Nottingham from the usurper John and his allies. Prove yourself as loyal to the true king by helping the good people of Nottinghamshire and the conflicting factions at work against Prince John. Skulk through the forest of Sherwood, uncovering its numerous secrets, or maneuver unseen through Nottingham’s streets, fighting the enemies of King Richard, and shape the fate of Nottingham forever.

Explore an authentic, historically-accurate Nottinghamshire


While exploring Nottinghamshire, you will witness the results of extensive research into late 12th century England that will inform every facet of the game world - the populations of towns, the armor and fighting styles of knights and soldiers, the architectural styles that existed, and the ways of life of ordinary people and of kings and lords. This historically-accurate weaves in a fantasy adventure, where supernatural forces clash with the day-to-day lives of grounded, believable characters with their own convictions, goals, and opinions.

Hide in the Shadows


Take advantage of immersive stealth mechanics. Enemies will struggle to find you in dark areas, and won’t be able to hear you when you take advantage of quiet surfaces. On the other hand, showing yourself and making noise will guarantee danger will find you.

Gain favor with the factions of Nottinghamshire


Nottingham and Sherwood are home to many factions and groups with their own goals, priorities, and interests, such as the monks of Lenton Priory, rival outlaws, or the nobility. You must choose who to side with in the fight against Prince John, but remember - you can’t please everyone, and helping one faction will mean another will grow to resent you.

Fight the enemies of the true king


The king has vanished, and Prince John’s evil allies have taken up positions of power, left vacant by those who took up the cross and sailed for the Holy Land. But to unravel the truth behind Prince John’s usurpation, you’ll need to fight his wicked servants as well as the dark powers that dwell in the forest. Hidden and ancient evils dwell in forgotten Roman and Danish ruins, where carefully guarded treasures and lore will reveal the true powers working to destroy the soul of England.

Key Features

  • Fight or sneak through castles, ancient crypts and villas, and woodland hideouts as the heroic outlaw Robin Hood
  • Realistic stealth mechanics including using shadows to remain concealed, and using quiet surfaces to remain unheard
  • Quests with branching paths resulting in dynamic changes to faction reputations
  • For fans of immersive RPGs who love detailed, fleshed-out worlds or historical accuracy
  • Created by a solo developer

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, including medieval combat and fantastical elements such as magic used in combat. This game also contains alcohol consumption in the form of ale and wine that would have been popular in 12th century England.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, or DX12 capable graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Liberate Nottingham from the dark alliances of Prince John as the daring outlaw Robin Hood. Stick to the shadows of the forest, explore the secrets of Nottinghamshire, fight the enemies of King Richard, gain the favor of factions, and shape the fate of Nottingham forever. A historical fantasy RPG.
